title: Hi! All
content:
Hi everyone here! let me introduce my self...ROM..Im from México City and I'm starting to get into the dark arts of typography by my self... basicly I dont know that much...but really interested to learn. So i'll appriciate your help in the future.

Your friend

ROM
author: ROM

comments.content:
Ok this is my first trial... please give your commentaries..of course is not finished yet... thank you all

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021031208im_/http:/typophile.com/files/collete_4894.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021031208im_/http:/typophile.com/files/collete2_3816.jpg)

Kind of pretty but you’ll get better advice if you post it in the Critique forums.

Oh and welcome.

Tim
